data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure (Ultrasound Workstation), Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: BPUBFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [1=presence] [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUBCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB01
variable.description: Ankle time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB04
variable.description: First arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB07
variable.description: Second arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB10
variable.description: Third arm time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB13
variable.description: Sitting time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB16
variable.description: First standing time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB19
variable.description: Second standing time [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB02
variable.description: Ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB03
variable.description: Ankle diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB05
variable.description: First arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB06
variable.description: First arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB08
variable.description: Second arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.description: Second arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB11
variable.description: Third arm systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB12
variable.description: Third arm diastolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB14
variable.description: Sitting systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]

variable.name: BPUB15

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Ankle Brachial BP (Blood Pressure - ultrasound work station), exam 4]
